semantic_identifier: 172: feat: Sales_Accelerator: enforce published-only positioning versions + blocking UX when pinned version unavailable

sections.text:
## Description

## Summary
This PR prevents Sales_Accelerator from generating/sending messaging using any Customer_Analyzer positioning content that is not an approved/published version. It adds server-side enforcement, a structured error contract for missing/unpublished pinned versions, and UI updates to surface the pinned version and a clear “request Marketing to publish” blocking state instead of silently swapping content.

## Backend changes
- Added server-side validation in the Sales_Accelerator messaging/recommendation generation flow to:
  - Resolve the pinned positioning block version for the account/opportunity.
  - Verify the resolved version exists and is in a `PUBLISHED/APPROVED` state.
  - Reject drafts, unversioned payloads, and any non-published statuses.
- Introduced a structured error response when generation cannot proceed:
  - Error code (e.g. `POSITIONING_VERSION_UNAVAILABLE`).
  - Human-readable reason (missing vs unpublished vs invalid status).
  - `pinnedVersionId` + metadata for the last known pinned version (when available) as the only allowed fallback reference.
- Ensured generation/send endpoints never “auto-fallback” to latest/different content on the server; the only permissible reference is the pinned published version.

## Frontend changes
- Updated the Sales_Accelerator messaging/recommendation UI to:
  - Display the pinned positioning version identifier/label used for the current content.
  - Render the new structured error as a blocking state (no generate/send) with an explicit reason.
  - Show a clear call-to-action prompt to request Marketing publish a new positioning variant rather than silently switching content.

## Behavior changes (user-facing)
- If a pinned positioning version is missing or not published, users will be blocked from generating/sending messaging and will see the reason and the last known pinned version details.
- Draft/unversioned positioning content will never be used in Sales_Accelerator.

## Notes
- This is a high-priority safety/consistency fix: enforcement is server-side to avoid client bypasses.
- Existing successful flows remain unchanged when the pinned version is published.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
